casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. James Lyons, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 56455;First DistrictDecember 1, 1972.John L. White, of Chicago, (Robert K. Kelty, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and Stephen R. Kramer, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Rehearing denied January 3, 1973.

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE DRUCKER.
